name: Anytime Quilts
description:
Anytime Quilts is a Tetris-style game of placing blocks, except very casual.  There are no high-scores, only hand-crafted works of art. 

This first version completed for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Further development could add features not available due to time constraints.  Some ideas are scissors blocks to remove tiles, more quilt patterns, layout your own quilt pattern...then build it, a follow-on quilting mini game to quilt over the blocks that have been pieced together before adding the border.  The whole scene could be dressed up and made a little cozier.
